About Me

Hello! I am Hung, based in US with over 20 years of experience, from technical support & deployment, to product management/strategy, to presales and business development. Working with customers seems like a second nature to me. The one thing I'd say is put in the effort to understand your customers' needs and advocate for them; it will show and they will come to trust you.
